title: Ep 20: The Butt Grumble
description:
Today's Proceedings:  A son who is overly mean to his loving (?) father, some one who believes guests should be asked to provide gifts for weddings, and some who has had wonderful relations with their husband.  Also, we discuss the story of Josh embarrassing himself in front of his friends and others with an ill timed butt grumble.  Erika also introduces us to a Facebook group full of women sharing their thoughts on unfruitful sexual relationships!

Rate and Review our podcast and share it with your friends!

Follow us on Twitter:

https://twitter.com/judgiespod

Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/judgiespod

Music by: Iván

https://open.spotify.com/artist/0dlYkMquTDLwn0Wh3A8U4s?si=5ayT43JfRVux2qrKpOkvpg

https://www.youtube.com/user/lilwillis121
